title: Is Your Heart Racing?
description: An interactive data visualization to explore how surgeries impact heartrate. Won 'Best Project Award' for DSC 106 at UCSD.

title: Bikewatching
description: An interactive visualization for biking traffic in Boston based on time of day and departures/arrivals.

title: Ethical Considerations in NLP Tool for Medical Language Bias
description: Pitch for an NLP tool to detect language bias in clinical notes for marginalized groups, specifically focused on ethical issues arising in data collection and analysis.

title: Investigation on Nutrition
description: A statistical project investigating the effect of nutrition on percption of health and diet culture. Applied a linear regression model to predict calories based on thousands of online recipes.

title: Surgeries and Hospital Stay
description: An interactive data visualization comparing the hospital stays post-surgery for procedures on different parts of the body by gender.

title: N-Gram Language Model
description: Introductory langauge processing model that builds on the foundations of probability to generate text.
